p: The chosen tree of shade-grown system is crucial for the success of the management ( Morais etÂ al., 2006), and has to be according to: (i) the objective of the system (frost protection, windbreak, high temperature protection, buffer humidity, and ecological services); and (ii) the local conditions (soil, climate, and adaptability of species to the region). Using Envi-met, an easily accessible freeware, as an operational application helps decision makers and farmers to adopt the most adequate species to shade the coffee, evaluating real actions to adapt to climate change scenarios.
